summary: Six days in the lives of an Israeli living in a kibbutz and a Palestinian living in Paris, which starts with an accidental meeting in the Berlin Subway during the World cup finals, will change them completely.
cast: Liron Levo|Lubna Azabal|Abdallah El Akal|Birol Ünel|Patrick Albenque|Dominique Lollia|Clémence Thioly|Mila Dekker|Stephane Pouillot
title: Strangers
